page.title: 09ALDSMEAD RECREATION GROUND
page.content: My impressions of the sport field by Carol Stevens (9 years) I think that people walk their dogs on the field. I see them there. Cubs and Scouts play football rounders,cricket and other sports. The field is used for a fair called Aldmead Fair. The field is a big open space and is a short cut for children coming to school or people going to work. People go to the cemetery at the back of the field. Men and boys plau golf there but they are not supposed to. When I take my friends there I make sure that there isn't a dog in sight. It would be a very nice place to go for a picnic except for the dog's muck.
